title: Pinterest Expert
job_overview:
We are looking for a Pinterest expert to grow direct-to-customer sales. If you’re a self-starter, data-driven, and skilled in Pinterest SEO, this role is for you!

Responsibilities:
? Develop and implement a Pinterest strategy to increase brand visibility and website traffic
? Optimize Pinterest with keyword-rich descriptions, tags, and boards
? Create visually appealing pins using Canva that align with the brand’s aesthetic
? Monitor and analyze Pinterest metrics to refine strategies for growth
? Collaborate via Slack and communicate progress regularly
? Stay up to date with Pinterest trends and algorithm changes

Requirements:
? Proven experience managing successful Pinterest marketing campaigns
? Strong understanding of Pinterest SEO, tags, and analytics
? Familiarity with Shopify, Flodesk, and Klaviyo (or willingness to learn)
? Self-motivated, proactive, and able to meet deadlines
? Open to feedback and willing to suggest new ideas
? Experience in the creative business industry is a plus

Work Hours:
? 10-15 hours weekly
? Flexible schedule
